mapper.select: select u.id,u.phonenumber,u.realname,u.headimg,u.ctime from b_contacts c,s_user u where c.userid=u.id and c.userid=#{userid} and c.agree=1;
select * from s_user where id in (select contactsid from b_contacts where agree=0 and userid=#{userid})
mapper.update: update b_contacts set agree=1 where userid=#{userid} and contactsid=#{contactsid}
